languages.text: {n}Когда еретики все же поняли, что против них ведется истребление, было слишком поздно. Лидеры их были преданы смерти, а оставшиеся силы могли лишь погибнуть в суровой мясорубке уличных боев.{/n}
{n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда еретики все же поняли, что против них ведется истребление, было слишком поздно. Лидеры их были преданы смерти, а оставшиеся силы могли лишь погибнуть в суровой мясорубке уличных боев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When the heretics have finally realised that they were being exterminated, it was too late. Their leaders were killed and the rest of their manpower died in the brutal grinder of the street battles.{/n}

{n}When the heretics have finally realised that they were being exterminated, it was too late. Their leaders were killed and the rest of their manpower died in the brutal grinder of the street battles.{/n}
{n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}

{n}When the heretics finally realised that they were being led to their extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the brutal carnage of the street battles.{/n}

{n}When the heretics finally realised that they were being led to their extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the brutal carnage of the street battles.{/n}
{n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}
{n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}
{n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当那些异端分子终于意识到大势已去时，一切都来不及了。他们的首领被杀，其余的人则在巷战的屠杀中一命呜呼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当那些异端分子终于意识到大势已去时，一切都来不及了。他们的首领被杀，其余的人则在巷战的屠杀中一命呜呼。{/n}
{n}当那些异端分子终于意识到他们大势已去时，一切都来不及了。他们的首领被杀，其余的人则在巷战的屠杀中一命呜呼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando los herejes por fin se dieron cuenta de su inminente exterminio, era demasiado tarde. Sus líderes fueron asesinados y el resto murió en la masacre de las batallas callejeras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando los herejes por fin se dieron cuenta de su inminente exterminio, era demasiado tarde. Sus líderes fueron asesinados y el resto murió en la masacre de las batallas callejeras.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異端者たちが、自分たちが根絶に導かれていることにようやく気づいたときにはすでに手遅れだった。リーダーたちは虐殺され、残りの者たちも街頭戦の大量虐殺で死んでいった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異端者たちが、自分たちが根絶に導かれていることにようやく気づいたときにはすでに手遅れだった。リーダーたちは虐殺され、残りの者たちも街頭戦の残酷な大量虐殺で死んでいった。{/n}
{n}異端者たちが、自分たちが根絶に導かれていることにようやく気づいたときにはすでに手遅れだった。リーダーたちは虐殺され、残りの者たちも街頭戦の残酷な大量虐殺で死んでいった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quand les hérétiques finissent par réaliser qu'ils vont être exterminés, il est déjà trop tard. Leurs chefs ont été tués et les autres agonisent en pleine rue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand les hérétiques finissent par réaliser qu'ils vont être exterminés, il est déjà trop tard. Leurs chefs ont été tués et les autres agonisent en pleine rue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als die Ketzer endlich erkannten, dass ihnen die Vernichtung drohte, war es schon zu spät. Die Anführer wurden ermordet, der Rest starb im Gemetzel der Straßenschlachten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als die Ketzer endlich erkannten, dass ihnen die Vernichtung drohte, war es schon zu spät. Die Anführer wurden ermordet, der Rest starb im Gemetzel der Straßenschlachten.{/n}
{n}Als die Ketzer endlich erkannten, dass sie zu ihrer Auslöschung geführt wurden, war es schon zu spät. Die Anführer wurden ermordet, der Rest starb im blutigen Gemetzel der Straßenschlachten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kâfirler, en nihayetinde yok oluşlarıyla karşı karşıya olduklarını fark ettiklerinde her şey için çok geçti. Liderleri katledildi, geri kalanları ise sokaklarda süren çatışmaların katliamında can verdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the heretics finally realised that they were facing extermination, it was too late. Their leaders were slain and the rest of them died amid the carnage of the street battles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kâfirler, en nihayetinde yok oluşlarıyla karşı karşıya olduklarını fark ettiklerinde her şey için çok geçti. Liderleri katledildi, geri kalanları ise sokaklarda süren çatışmaların katliamında can verdi.{/n}
